body.p: This will introduce to you my brother Dr. Jacob & James Cornell who will bring you a petition and hope you will give it a favorable consideration.

I am personally acquainted with Jas. Cornell Esq and know him to be an honest upright clever young man -- you can rely upon his statements. I know nothing of his case. But I believe in fact know him to be a law abing citizen
